metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2252 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in rssh before 2.3.4, when the rsync protocol is enabled, allows local users to bypass intended restricted shell access via the --rsh command line option.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rssh - 2.3.4-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rssh package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-4').
